## Overview

This Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) invites potential service providers to submit their qualifications and propose prices for the provision of underground steam line repair services. 

The expected duration of this project is two years, starting from May 22, 2024, and ending on March 15, 2026.

**Key Requirements:**

* Provision of skilled licensed labour
* Tools and equipment
* Supervision 
* Materials, as required by the Department of National Defence 

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Lowest Price 

**Closing Date and Time:** May 30, 2024, at 14:00 EDT. Please note that any bids submitted after 14:00 EDT will be declared non-responsive. 

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Matthew Keenan
* Email: [matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

For more information and to access the solicitation documents, please visit the Ariba Discovery webpage.

`
